description:
Experience. Innovation. Determination. At Rogers, Patrick, Westbrook & Brickman LLC, these are the qualities that set our firm apart. Our attorneys have a reputation for providing skilled, tenacious legal representation. We use a combination of innovative and tried-and-true legal strategies to protect our clients' rights and interests.

From our office in Mount Pleasant, South Carolina, we provide plaintiff-focused legal representation in a wide range of areas, including:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Toxic tort
  • Asbestos litigation
  • Commercial litigation
  • Securities fraud
  • Employment law and whistleblower/qui tam lawsuits
  • Environmental law
  • White collar criminal defense
  • General civil litigation

Pioneers In Asbestos Litigation

For years, asbestos manufacturers and employers knew the dangers of asbestos, and did nothing to protect employees and the general public. At RPWB, we don't think the asbestos industry should profit from your pain.

RPWB is one of the premiere asbestos litigation firms in the country. Our lawyers were among the first to hold asbestos manufacturers liable for the harm caused by their products.

Our attorneys have dedicated their careers to bringing the asbestos industry to justice, and getting our clients the compensation they need to pay for medical treatment and support their families into the future. We are here for you.

If you or a loved one has been diagnosed with mesothelioma or another asbestos-related disease, contact our firm. Consultations are free.
